definition[0]: (1947–) a US actor born in Austria, who was a famous bodybuilder (=someone who develops large muscles through physical exercise), and then became an actor in exciting violent films such as Conan the Barbarian (1982) and Total Recall (1990). He is known for his large muscles, for speaking English with a strong German accent, and for saying ‘I’ll be back’ in the film  The Terminator (1984). He was governor of California from 2003 until January 2011.
